events.title: Haiti earthquake
events.description: A catastrophic magnitude 7.0 earthquake struck near Port-au-Prince, Haiti, causing widespread collapse of buildings and massive casualties. The disaster triggered a major humanitarian crisis with estimates of hundreds of thousands of deaths and extensive damage to infrastructure.
events.significance: One of the deadliest earthquakes in modern history; prompted a massive international relief effort and long-term reconstruction challenges for Haiti.

events.title: Birth of Jeff Bezos
events.description: Jeffrey Preston Bezos, who would go on to found Amazon.com, was born in Albuquerque, New Mexico. He would later transform global commerce and cloud computing with Amazon and AWS.
events.significance: Bezos' leadership and Amazon's innovations helped catalyze the modern e-commerce era and reshape multiple technology-driven industries.
